name: UI Design Challenge
description: Design a modern and user-friendly landing page UI for a startup using Figma or Adobe XD.

name: Creative Writing Contest
description: Write a short story based on the theme 'Hope in Darkness' with originality and emotion.

name: Gaming Review Contest
description: Write an honest and engaging review of your favorite game including pros and cons.

name: UX Case Study Contest
description: Analyze a real product UX and suggest improvements with proper reasoning.

name: Poster Design Battle
description: Design an eye-catching poster for an upcoming tech conference event.

name: Frontend Battle
description: Build a responsive homepage using React and Tailwind CSS following the provided design.
